column5: If you haven't studied business before, this course is ideal. Explore all aspects of general management, from managing people and finance to strategic planning, operations and marketing. You'll graduate ready for work with the skills to succeed. Accredited by the Association of MBAs and the Chartered Management Institute.Our Management MSc is ideal if you have never studied business before and want to gain a solid knowledge base. Covering all aspects of general management, from managing people and finances to strategic planning, operations and marketing, this course produces work-ready graduates with the skills to succeed.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
